content:
Hi {clientName},

I hope this email finds you well. My name is Adam Black, and I work as the Image Permissions Specialist for NCCER's Product Development department. As you may know, NCCER is a leading non-profit education foundation, offering over 70 craft areas in construction and maintenance curricula.

Our Technical Writers came across your website and found {someText} wonderful {imagText}. We're currently updating our {craftType} Curricula and would be thrilled to use {imageText} in our module, "{module}". The Requested {imagText} can be found {hereText}. 

In order to include {imageText} our updated materials, we'll need a signed permission and license form to provide our publisher. If you're interested in assisting us with this, I can send the form for your review and signature. Additionally, we'll need a high-resolution file of the image for both print and digital use. We will credit, "Courtesy of {companyName}" per your specification.

Please feel free to reach out if you have any questions, need further clarification, or would like to discuss this opportunity further.

Respectfully,
Adam Black

Thank you {clientName}!

We are excited to share that {numImages} images for your {craftType} are now ready. You can access them in the {module} module.

Sincerely,
{companyName}

Hi {clientName},

{numImages} images for your {craftType} are processed successfully. Please check the {module} module on our platform.

Thanks for choosing {companyName}.

Regards,
{companyName} Team
